create_shape_command_no_access: Can't create org shape. Contact the org admin to enable Org Shape for Scratch Orgs in `Setup > Org Shape` in a supported org. Then try again.
create_shape_command_no_crud_access: Can't create org shape. Contact the org admin to grant you access to the ShapeRepresentation object. Then try again.
create_shape_command_success_file: Successfully created scratch org definition file in the project's config directory for %s.
shape_create_failed_message: Error creating scratch definition file. Please contact Salesforce support.
delete_shape_command_no_access: The org with name: %s needs to be enabled for org shape before shapes can be deleted.
shape_get_not_a_shape_id: the value passed in was not a shape id
